articles.title: Oregon health officials hand out leftover vaccines on the roadside after snow closure - KATU
articles.description: JOSEPHINE COUNTY, Ore. (KTVL) — County health officials in Oregon were able to save some doses of the coronavirus vaccine from spoiling by giving them to drivers who were stuck on the side of the road during a snowstorm Tuesday. Josephine County Health …
